# Pull Request Template

## Description
Please provide a clear and concise description of the changes introduced by this PR.

- What problem does it solve?
- What feature does it add?
- What part of the codebase does it affect?

## Type of Change
Check the relevant option:

- [ ] Bug fix  
- [ ] New feature  
- [ ] Enhancement  
- [ ] Documentation update  
- [ ] Other (specify):

## Related Issues
If applicable, link issues here:

Closes #ISSUE_NUMBER  
Related to #ISSUE_NUMBER

## How Has This Been Tested?
Describe the tests performed to verify your changes:

- [ ] Manual testing  
- [ ] Unit tests  
- [ ] Integration tests  
- Other notes:

## Screenshots (if applicable)
Add screenshots or recordings if the change affects the UI.

## Checklist
Before submitting, confirm the following:

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines  
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (if needed)  
- [ ] Tests have been added or updated  
- [ ] No sensitive data is included
